data.fullContent: One approach that can help clinicians individualize chemotherapy dosing is to measure the drug levels in blood plasma over time and adjust dose according to a formula or algorithm to achieve optimal exposure. With an established target exposure for optimized treatment effectiveness with minimized toxicities, dosing can be personalized to achieve target exposure and optimal results for each patient. Such an algorithm was used in the clinical trials cited above and resulted in significantly improved treatment outcomes.
data.answer: 帮助临床医生个性化化疗剂量的一种方法是测量随时间变化的血浆药物水平，并根据公式或算法调整剂量，以达到最佳曝光。通过建立目标暴露以达到最佳治疗效果和最小毒性，剂量可以个性化，以达到目标曝光和每个病人的最佳结果。在上述临床试验中使用了该算法，并显著改善了治疗结果。
